titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, December 5, 1944

mods.tableOfContents: Dedication by Robert Buck. Duck Dance. Turkey and Hound Dance (Hoot-Owl). Horse and Mule Dance (Jassack) (Fox & Hound). Buffalo Dance. Old Fashioned (Old Man) Dance. Double Leader (Social Dance). Church Songs in Creek. Repeat Duck Dance. Repeat Turkey and Hound. Animal Sounds by Robert Buck.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
